content: Just a note to say You've got this, {wife_name}! I believe in you completely. Can't wait to see you later!
Just a note to say Remember how strong you are - you can handle anything! Thinking of you always.
Random thought: I'm so proud of everything you've accomplished. Forever yours.
Hope you're having a great day! Whatever you're facing today, I know you'll overcome it. You're the best!
{wife_name}, Your determination and courage inspire me every day. Have a wonderful day!
Hope you're having a great day! You are capable of amazing things, {wife_name}! Thinking of you always.
Sending you love because Don't forget how incredible you truly are. Miss you!
I'm your biggest cheerleader, today and always. XOXO
Thinking of you and You have overcome so much - this is nothing for you! XOXO
{wife_name}, Your strength and resilience amaze me constantly. Miss you!

Quick reminder: Whatever challenge you face, we face it together. Love you!
